pr_title: [FLINK-17590][connector/filesystem] Support bucket lifecycle listener in streaming file sink buckets

timeline.bodyText: Add litsener setter to this bulk part writer builder?
timeline.author: JingsongLi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -401,6 +402,7 @@ public T withOutputFileConfig(final OutputFileConfig outputFileConfig) {
 					bucketFactory,
 					new BulkPartWriter.Factory<>(writerFactory),
 					rollingPolicy,
+					null,

replies.bodyText: I think we may only first add the listener for internal user this time ? We may publish the listen also to users' API when we are more confirm with the listener interface in the future.
replies.author: gaoyunhaii

replies.bodyText: For the table file system connector, it uses BulkWriter and Encoder to write files, so it need this listener too.
replies.author: JingsongLi

replies.bodyText: Added the listener to the format builder to allow users to use it.
replies.author: gaoyunhaii

timeline.bodyText: Add listener setter to this row wise part writer builder?
timeline.author: JingsongLi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -291,6 +291,7 @@ T withBucketFactory(final BucketFactory<IN, BucketID> factory) {
 					bucketFactory,
 					new RowWisePartWriter.Factory<>(encoder),
 					rollingPolicy,
+					null,

timeline.author: JingsongLi

replies.bodyText: Do we need to supports more than one listeners currently ? I think we might postpone the support if it could support the current use cases. We should be able to keep compatibility with adding a new withBucketLifeCycleListener(List<BucketLifeCycleListener> listeners> to the  format builder.
replies.author: gaoyunhaii

timeline.message: [FLINK-17590][connector/filesystem] Support bucket lifecycle listener in streaming file sink buckets
Allow users to configure the BucketLifeCycleListener
Allow users to configure the BucketLifeCycleListener
